rooms.description: Large entrance hall with space for a small foyer, reception area following Vastu guidelines. Entry facing the auspicious North-East direction.

Open-plan living area combining seating and dining spaces. Features Mediterranean style design with exposed beams, terracotta tiles, and ample natural light from large windows oriented in the South-West direction for balance.
Open-plan kitchen integrated within the living area. Equipped with a Mediterranean color palette, with stone accents and functional layout aligned with Vastu guidelines ensuring proper energy flow.
Dedicated dining space adjacent to the open-plan living area. Features natural lighting from a north-facing window as per Vastu principles.
Master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, private balcony facing the auspicious North-East direction for positive energy flow. Mediterranean-style decor using warm textures and soft hues.

Two secondary bedrooms sharing a common area, each with ample natural light aligned with Vastu principles. Interior design incorporates Mediterranean elements such as stone finishes and terracotta tiles.
Shared bathroom serving the secondary bedrooms. Designed to follow functional space planning, maintaining privacy while adhering to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Large front door to welcome positive energy, aligned with Vastu principles favoring the North-East entrance.
Access door providing secondary exit and ventilation. Sized appropriately per Mediterranean design standards.
